## Variables.getVariableUsesById() function

Find all the uses of a named variable.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getVariableUsesById(workspace: Workspace, id: string): Block[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  workspace | [Workspace](./blockly.workspace_class.md) | The workspace to search for the variable. |
|  id | string | ID of the variable to find. |

**Returns:**

[Block](./blockly.block_class.md)<!-- -->\[\]

Array of block usages.
